title: News Content Crawling & Analysis
snippet:
News Content Analysis
We’re looking to do a regular analysis of our news site’s content versus a few key competitors.  We’re looking for someone to create a report comparing different aspects of our content from textual analysis to date/time.

Report Requirements
Given a list of 4-5 news websites and looking at the last 30 days create a report comparing the sites and individual reports for each site.

Comparative Report
•	Site’s Average Posts per day – each site’s average number of posts per day
•	Sites’ Average Shares per article – each site’s average number of shares per article during time period  (eg. SiteX has 100 articles with 1000 shares total, Site X has average of 10 shares per article)
•	Site’s Average Comments per article – each site’s average number of comments per article (NOTE: this may be too difficult to include, please let us know if it is and we can remove this requirement)
•	Sites Posts by day of week - bar graph of each site’s average number of posts for each day of the week  (eg. SiteX posts on average 7.3 articles on Monday, site Y on average posts 
•	Sites’ Posts by hour of day – bar graph of each site’s average number of posts for each hour of the day (e.g. SiteX posts on average 2 articles in the 9am hour, SiteY posts 4) Note: look at each site to normalize the timestamp’s timezone to US Eastern time
•	Top 5 most shared articles per site (list by site, with article title & count)
•	Top 5 word cloud words from each site (see site report)

Site Report (For each site)
•	Average Posts per day - just like comparative report, but with only this one site showing
•	Average Shares per article – just like comparative report, but with only this one site showing
•	Word Cloud – analyze the full text of all articles and create a word cloud for each site.  Be sure to exclude stopwords and we may create custom stopwords that are shared across all sites
•	Top 25 Most Shared Articles – shared on facebook 
•	Posts by day of week – just like comparative report, but with only this one site showing
•	Posts by hour of day – just like comparative report, but with only this one site showing
•	Post per author – a pie chart of all articles by author during time period
•	Top Author Names -  a list of the top 5 authors by article count
•	Top Shared Authors – a list of the top 5 authors with highest average share per article
•	Top 25 most commented on articles
Technical considerations
•	You’ll need to crawl the sites for this info, some may be available by RSS, but we need all articles back 30 days
•	You’ll need to fetch the share count from facebook.  See: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.8/url
•	We may want to run this report from time to time, so let us know how we might do that (if it’s code that can be installed on a simple hosting account, or uses third party service, etc).
